entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except freezing rain over southern sections overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow except freezing rain over southern sections early in the morning. Amount 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
